description: Try making gutural noises and using a made up langauge to sing, grunt or yell. It may seem silly, lean in to that and laugh. Just let out what you feel!
Try this chord progression in any key: I iii ii V
Try this chord progression in any key: i iv V  vi
Pick three random notes on your instrument. Then choose either major, minor, or dominant for each note and use those chords in a song.
Write down 2 emotions you are feeling now. Then write down something right in front of you. Now describe each of those in 2 lines, and put the lines together randomly.
Write a haiku about the first thing you ate today
Describe a recent day dream in two paragraphs
Write down four random words. Take the second letter from each word, and write a word that comes to mind from that. Then try to use these words in a sentence or two.
'Art is the elimination of the unnecesary.' ---Pablo Picasso
'There is no innovation and creativity without failure.' ---Brene Brown
'Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.' ---Vincent Van Gogh
'Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.' ---Leonardo Da Vinci
